name: 1000 Shells (anarkond)
description:
Enjoy the challenge of a interesting puzzle game! Can you complete all the levels?

Controls: WASD (movement), ENTER (entering the levels), 1 and 2 (rotating the camera), ESC (menu).

Ludum Dare 49 remake. We made this game with @mabrax and we are trying to iterate on it making improvements every week, we hope.  

If you find the game interesting in any kind of way or you stumble upon a bug, please let us now by writing a comment or sending us  an Email to anarkondrambler@gmail.com, we will very much appreciate your feedback!
